programme.title: Mothers Sacrifice
programme.desc: Alexs mom takes a big decision when she sees her children suffering so much, she makes a decision that will change their lives forever.

programme.title: The Octopus
programme.desc: Mr. Octopus will go any length to pull the princess of Umu Chukwu down, this moves blackmails the princess and hopes to destroy the kings family.

programme.title: My Past
programme.desc: Kenneths mother kills his father and warns him never to speak to anyone about it. Now his past haunts him and everyone around him feels the hurt of the wrong his mother did.

programme.title: Chetam
programme.desc: Nwoye faces betrayal from Adanna and Nnanna, Akuada accepts an offer she should refuse.

programme.title: Lauretta
programme.desc: After Gina gives birth to Lauretta, she handed her to her elder sister so she can take care of her. The happy story ends when she get pregnant for her own child.

programme.title: Chetam
programme.desc: Adanna and Nnanna face a crisis, Ejike fights to prove himself worthy.

programme.title: Open The Casket
programme.desc: Tochukwu and Chukwuemeka, adopted by their parents, commits unspeakable acts following their parents passing. This put the entire family in imminent disaster.

programme.title: A Mothers Bond
programme.desc: A single mother finds love again with a successful business man, he accepts her son, but while the union gets stronger the whole story changes.

programme.title: Blind Husband
programme.desc: Koko gives everything to Fred to get rich, now he is married to Lucy, but Koko has promised to give him a pound of her flesh. He is either married to her or no one else.

programme.title: Palace Hidden Treasure
programme.desc: Chukwudi will relinquish a crown to his brothers son after the prince frustrates him and his family. Now that the prince is about to ascend the throne, will he save Chukwudis family?

programme.title: Disguised Agenda
programme.desc: Sophie is a young street girl struggling and striving until she meet Adebayo, who gets her pregnant and abandons her. All hell breaks loose when she finds out that a secret about him.

programme.title: Monica And The Corper
programme.desc: When a young student seeks knowledge from Corper Steve, she is instead drawn into a dangerous entanglement that spirals out of control.

programme.title: Grandma
programme.desc: Rayford, a stubborn returnee from America disrespects his dad and grand mum. However, this is about to stop as his grandma device a means to make him humble.

programme.title: The City Wife
programme.desc: A village tailor arrives in the city to celebrate Christmas with his educated and successful fiancee, but he is shamed and sent out as she plans for her celebrity wedding.

programme.title: 2 Lives
programme.desc: Chief prepares and plans his daughter Janice into a family just for his own gains, but the worst hits and tables turn as love intercepts his plans.

programme.title: Chetam
programme.desc: Nnanna deals with the fall out of Nwoyes rejected proposal. Adanna and Mmesoma have a narrow escape.

programme.title: Her Holiness
programme.desc: Elizabeth frustrates John her husband with her spirituality, this continues and destroys the marriage as John is being pushed to the wall.

programme.title: A Life Like Hers
programme.desc: Dora and her daughter endure a life of loneliness and poverty until they cross paths with George, whose presence promised to change their fortunes.

programme.title: Cry Of The Pregnant Ghost
programme.desc: Collins gets a young village girl pregnant and refuse to take responsibility, this decision makes the girl seek other options.

programme.title: The Past The Ugly
programme.desc: Charles is once entangled with Medlines mother, but now back to marry Medline and leaves the past behind. However, the past has a way of never letting go.

programme.title: Heal My Scars
programme.desc: Benson is about to become a worse version of himself as his wife Chekwube will deny him of all marital duties.

programme.title: Undead Bride
programme.desc: When Afamefuna tries to say his vows to his wife, a spirit present, listens and accepts the vows. This puts him in a big dilemma.

programme.title: Even In Death
programme.desc: Ikenna and Oma die mysteriously but they decide to go back to the land of the living to continue living as no one knows that they were dead.

programme.title: Thank God Its Friday
programme.desc: Leonard finds himself torn between his love for Monique and Kaka. His indecisiveness about who to commit to eternally leaves everyone wondering who he will ultimately choose.

programme.title: His Mystery Lover
programme.desc: Bryans indecision between two women costs him true love, leaving him unable to commit and ultimately missing out on a genuine connection.

programme.title: My Pregnancy
programme.desc: A young lady wakes up to a sudden pregnancy. A pregnancy that throws everyone in a state of confusion and suspicion when it turns out she has no idea how it came by.

programme.title: The Obdurate
programme.desc: Ijeoma is refuses all the rich suitors that comes for her hand in marriage, because her sisters manipulate her out of jealousy. Now she has placed a curse on them never to be happy.

programme.title: Stabbed
programme.desc: Fatima and her child are accused for killing the man who helped and gives them a life , now somebody has to take the fall for a death, will the mother and daughter be saved from the law?

programme.title: Her Desire

programme.title: Crazy Kind Of Love
programme.desc: A rich American base returnee is crazily in love with a younger spinster who finds him unattractive as she believes true love cannot be found where it does not exist or stay.

programme.title: Check Mate

programme.title: Chatter That Counts

programme.title: The Next Titan

programme.title: The Real Housewives Of Lagos

programme.title: Big Brother Naija 10: Finale
programme.desc: Following evictions and Biggies goodbye, the Big Brother Naija Season 10 finale is here! Ebuka announces the winner who walks away with the grand prize. Do not miss the climax!

programme.title: Fates Scribble
programme.desc: Fresh out of jail, Dami, a single mother, embarks on a frantic quest to find her daughter, who has been sold and trafficked by the person she trusted as her guardian.

programme.title: Nanny
programme.desc: Naomi struggles to care for her fiances daughter, feeling detached as she did not birth her. She prefers hiring a nanny to prioritize more time with her fiance.

programme.title: Moment Of Truth
programme.desc: Max is accused by his wife for being impotent, little did she know that her friends children belong to her husband. This brews war as Max starts asking questions.

programme.title: Dont Tell My Wife
programme.desc: Reuben, a lawyer kills his best friend, but his spirit will not rest until Reuben confesses to the whole village.

programme.title: Hustle
programme.desc: the tale of Dayo, a gullible but optimistic young man who moves to Lagos with dreams of making it big.

programme.title: The Rishantes

programme.title: Tinsel

programme.title: Riona

programme.title: Forbidden

programme.title: Wounded

programme.title: Kingsman: The Secret Service
programme.desc: A disillusioned young man is recruited and trained by a secret spy agency, just as a megalomaniac billionaire hatches a deadly plan for global chaos.

programme.title: Norbit
programme.desc: A mild-mannered mans romance with his childhood sweetheart is threatened by the monstrous woman who has come to dominate his life.

programme.title: Mandy
programme.desc: Red Miller and his wife Mandy are living peacefully in a forest. Their lives are changed when they meet a cult leader who becomes obsessed with Mandy.

programme.title: Dangerous
programme.desc: An ex-Navy SEAL, struggling with mental-health issues, probes his brothers death while staying one step ahead of a gang of armed mercenaries.

programme.title: Planet Action
programme.desc: Go behind the scenes of the best action movies. In each episode, youll get all the secrets straight from your favourite action heroes.

programme.title: Open Season: Scared Silly
programme.desc: Boog, Elliot and Mr Weenie learn theres a werewolf on the loose. But worse is to come when Shaw uses this news to have the hunting season reopened.

programme.title: Barbie In Rock N Royals
programme.desc: Princess Courtneys world is turned upside down when she switches places with a famous rock star.
